_sText:
______________________________________
              CREDITS
______________________________________


Map made by Polarius & MisterMusician
Special thanks to : Halibel and lechat.be
(Team [Graou])


______________________________________
              INSTALL
______________________________________


Unzip "ba_jail_TowerPrison_v2.bsp" in :
...\Steam\SteamApps\YOURACCOUNT\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps


______________________________________
              CONTACT
______________________________________


Polarius : raki@hotmail.fr
MisterMusician : themike_18@hotmail.fr


______________________________________
            RULES/ZONES
______________________________________

Neutral Zone / Zone Neutre :

Principal Room / Salle principale
Swimming Pool / Piscine
Kitchen corridor / Couloir cuisine
Infirmary / Infirmerie
Underground yard / cour souterraine
Foot Corridor / Couloir foot
On the grass / Sur l'herbe
Park / Parc
ON the cage / SUR la cage
ON isolation room / SUR l'iso
Secret Room
ON the lights in the foot / SUR les lampadaires foot
Stairs / Escaliers
First Floor 

CT Zone / Zone CT :

Armory (Only at the beginning of the round)
Bridges / Passerelle
Elevator control room 
Jails's opening button place

T Zone / Zone Terro :

Armory (After the beginning
Large room in the Elevator
In the water / Dans l'eau
Water slide / Toboggan
Vents / Conduits
Kitchen / Cuisine
Cells / Cellules
V.I.P
Little cage on the first floor 
Foot / Terrain de foot
Isolation / Isolement
Cage / Cage
Sauna / Sauna

Ba_jail_TowerPrison_v2 Changelog :
English :

- Great modification on the first floor ( cells were moved to make it easier for the ct )
- Added a secret passage who leads to the button to open all the jails
- Added a V.I.P
- Added a little ugly cell
- Added stairs to go to the first floor without the lift
- Added some details
- Added two buttons to call the elevator
- Correct textures bug
- Correct blocks bug
- Correct a bug of the elevator's jail terro side
